actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code to provide specially adapted housing benefits to veterans suffering the loss, or loss of use of both arms.

summary.text: Authorizes the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs to provide specially adapted housing benefits to veterans suffering the loss, or loss of use, of both arms who are entitled to compensation for service after April 20, 1898, for permanent and total service-connected disability.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code to provide specially adapted housing benefits to veterans suffering the loss, or loss of use of both arms.
